Message has been copied to clipboard

ShareMyLocation Android App

This privacy policy governs the use of the software application Share My Location (“App”) for mobile devices that was created by WeryNg (“Developer”).

What information do we collect?

The Developer does not intentionally collect or make use of any information including device’s GPS location, phone contacts, emails, clipboards from your device or provided by you via the App.

Third party links and advertisement

Occasionally, at our discretion, the app may include or offer third party products or services. These third party app links have separate and independent privacy policies. Developer therefore have no responsibility or liability for the content and activities of these apps. Nonetheless, the Developer seek to protect the user experience on the app and welcome any feedback regarding these promotion links.

Your consent

By using the app, you consent to this privacy policy

Feedback

Please use the Contact Developer link on the Setting page if you wish to contact the Developer. Any feedback and contributions are welcome.
Please refresh the location first to determine your location
